title.rendered: Peshawar vs Islamabad, Pakistan T20 League 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Peshawar: Mohammad Haris (wk), Babar Azam (c), Saim Ayub, Tom Kohler-Cadmore, Rovman Powell, Dasun Shanaka, James Neesham, Wahab Riaz, Sufiyan Muqeem, Usman Qadir, Arshad Iqbal

Islamabad: Paul Stirling, Hassan Nawaz, Rassie van der Dussen, Colin Munro, Azam Khan (wk), Shadab Khan (c), Faheem Ashraf, Tom Curran, Abrar Ahmed, Rumman Raees, Mohammad Wasim Jr

Venue: National Stadium, Karachi

Pitch Report

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 179

2nd innings average score: 141

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: 66%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Babar Azam boasts great numbers in Karachi. He has amassed 1,730 runs at 60, including the highest score of 110*.

James Neesham too fancies playing at the venue. In his last two appearances here, he picked three wickets and registered scores of 38 and 16*.

Wahab Riaz has bagged 25 wickets, including the best figures of 4 for 17, against Islamabad. With the bat, he has the highest score of 33*.

Despite good batting conditions, Usman Qadir has maintained impressive numbers. He has picked 18 wickets, including the best figures of 2 for 18, at the National Stadium.

Through consistent contributions with the bat, Rovman Powell has featured in the Best11 in four of his last five games.

At the National Stadium, Colin Munro has collected 285 runs at 41, including the highest score of 71*. Above all, in his last five games in the league, he scored two thirties and three fifties.

Besides taking 12 wickets against Peshawar, Shadab Khan has the highest score of 77. At the venue, he has 32 wickets in 22 games, including the best figures of 5 for 28.

In his last five T20s, Rassie van der Dussen has added 194 runs at 39 and thus his Best11 percentage reads 80 in his last five appearances.

Azam Khan has accumulated 367 runs at 31, including the highest score of 65, in Karachi. When he last played at the venue, he smashed 44 and pouched two catches.
